name: velocity-lab
description: Exchange Hybrid Migration Training Platform with Apple-inspired UI and Unifi Cloud theming

scripts.dev: wrangler pages dev ./public --kv VELOCITY_USERS --kv VELOCITY_PROGRESS --kv VELOCITY_SESSIONS --kv VELOCITY_LABS

author: Velocity Lab
